TneTabItem.HintText Property

Summary

Defines the text to show as hint.

Namespace: neTabItem
Syntax
Delphi
published
 property HintText: string read fHintText write fHintText;

Property Value

Type: string

 

Remarks

  1. Works only if HintType is Text
  2. If blank, it shows the title of the tab

See Also

Reference

  • TneTabItem
  • neTabItem
